We refer to Wikipedia articles on film for help. The events are presented in chronological order in the audio clip.

Therefore, the answer is (B).

The correct chronological order of events is: (1) A close-up of the “Scopa” card game box appears. (2) The kids stack their hands together, declaring themselves underdogs. (3) Alberto hammers wood while his friend holds a wooden frame by the sea. (4) A text screen explains Luca is based on director Enrico Casarosa’s childhood friend Alberto. (5) Luca and Alberto ride a handmade rocket-bike; Luca looks scared while Alberto acts confident. (6) At a table, Luca spits out his drink, splashing Alberto and triggering a partial sea-monster face.

Therefore, the answer is option C: 1 -> 2 -> 4 -> 3 -> 5 -> 6.
